short_summary: A solicitation for one (1) forklift and ancillary items for an expected delivery date of march 29, 2024
description: The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada has a requirement for one (1) forklift and ancillary items. This bid solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL\/A. The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is March 29, 2024. The solicitation process is competitive and the selection criteria will be based on lowest price. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. This intel will be useful. It is sent direct
full_summary:
# Forklift and Ancillary Items Tender Announcement
### Reference Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-491-8123749
* **Solicitation Number:** 5000076065
* **Amendment Number:** 5
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-30
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00
* **Status:** Expired

### Tender Details

* **Title:** Forklift and Ancillary Items
* **Description:** The Contracting Authority, Environment and Climate Change Canada, requires a forklift and ancillary items for the National Capital Region.
* **Required Delivery Date:** 2024-03-29
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Procurement Process

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

### Bidder Information

* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Samantha Walerickton
	+ Email: Samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (902) 920-4445
	+ Address: 45 Alderney Drive, Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6, Canada

### Pre-qualified Suppliers

* This bid solicitation is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.
* Refer to: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868 for more information.

### Next Steps

* Bidders who wish to become a pre-qualified supplier must submit their application according to the specified deadline.
* The contract will be awarded to the lowest priced bidder.

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-30
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-14T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-04
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

### Contact Information for Bidder Clarifications

If you have any questions regarding this tender announcement, please email Samantha Walerickton at Samantha.walerickton@ec.gc.ca or call (902) 920-4445
